interfaces.name: AS_GSS_HCL_displayWrapperContents
interfaces.description: The  generic Header content layout for displaying contents in evaluation summary

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_cardsAsSectionedSideNavigation
interfaces.description: Grouping of card layouts to be used for sectioned side navigation

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!choices,
  expression: rule!AS_CO_CPS_richTextSection(
    sectionLabel: fv!item.label,
    contents: rule!AS_GSS_CRD_cardsAsSideNavigation(
      choiceIcons: fv!item.choiceIcons,
      choiceLabels: fv!item.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: fv!item.choiceValues,
      choiceLinks: fv!item.choiceLinks,
      value: ri!value,
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      selectedIcon: ri!selectedIcon,
      showItemCount: false,
      isChecklistStatus: false,
      i18nData: ri!i18nData
    )
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_displayHeader
interfaces.description: Used to display header text. Pass in a value from `AS_CO_CONS_HEADER_LEVELS` as the `headerLevel`. A header should be used to describe a group of components below it, to help organize a page.

interfaces.name: AS_CO_CPS_richTextSection
interfaces.description: A richer-style section to use in in navigation and when displaying detailed information

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CRD_cardsAsSideNavigation
interfaces.description: Card layout to be used for side or panel navigation

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!choiceValues,
    expression: a!localVariables(
      local!isSelected: rule!AS_CO_UT_compare(
        value1: ri!value,
        value2: ri!choiceValues[fv!index]
      ),
      local!hasLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt: ri!choiceLabels, field: fv!index)),
      local!itemIcon: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceIcons, field: fv!index),
      local!itemLink: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(cdt:ri!choiceLinks, field: fv!index),
      local!iconToShow: if(
        local!isSelected,
        rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
          nullableValue: ri!selectedIcon,
          replacementValue: local!itemIcon
        ),
        local!itemIcon
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
        contents: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
            value: {
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: {
                  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: local!iconToShow, size: "MEDIUM"),
                  " "
                },
                showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!iconToShow)
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: ri!choiceLabels[fv!index],
                size: "MEDIUM",
                showWhen: local!hasLabel,
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {})
              ),
              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                text: " (" & ri!itemCount[fv!index] & ")",
                size: "MEDIUM",
                color: if(ri!isChecklistStatus, "ACCENT", {}),
                showWhen: ri!showItemCount
              )
            }
          )
        },
        link: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!itemLink),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
            value: ri!choiceValues[fv!index],
            saveInto: ri!saveInto,
            showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!disabled)
          ),
          local!itemLink
        ),
        accessibilityText: if(
          local!isSelected,
          "Selected",
          ""
        ),
        style: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_not(local!isSelected),
          "NONE",
          ri!disabled,
          "STANDARD",
          "ACCENT"
        ),
        showBorder: false
      )
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_compare
expression_rules.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the content of the values match (regardless of type).

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey
expression_rules.description: Returns a GSS branding value by key

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
expression_rules.description: Executes displayValue, but allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value

data.sail_code:
displayvalue(

  ri!value,

  ri!inArray,

  ri!replacement,

  if(

    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],

    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],

    ri!customDefault
  )
)
data.definition:
displayvalue(
  
  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,
  
  if(
    
    ri!firstIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[1],
    
    ri!lastIsDefault,
    ri!replacement[count(ri!replacement)],
    
    ri!customDefault
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
expression_rules.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_not
expression_rules.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

constants.name: AS_GSS_TMG_PM_TASK_MANAGEMENT
constants.description: Value: AS GSS TMG Task Management Process Model

constants.description: HEADER_ONE - Used to display a header of weighting 1

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_HEADER_LEVEL_TWO
constants.description: HEADER_TWO - Used to display a header of weighting 2

constants.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
constants.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

constants.name: AS_GSS_TMG_DOC_WELCOME_IMAGE_TEMPLATES
constants.description: Value: AS GSS TMG Welcome Image Templates

constants.name: AS_GSS_TMG_DOC_WELCOME_IMAGE_CATEGORIES
constants.description: Value: AS GSS TMG Welcome Image Categories

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_HEADER_LEVEL_THREE
constants.description: HEADER_THREE - Used to display a header of weighting 3

constants.name: AS_GSS_FAVICON
constants.description: Constant reference to the AS GSS Favicon document

constants.name: AS_GSS_TMG_DOC_WELCOME_IMAGE_TASKS
constants.description: Value: AS GSS TMG Welcome Image Tasks
